title: "Notes"
format: gfm
---

Keep your own notes as you work through *Statistical Rethinking* here. It is recommended to do so as an organized series of Quarto files (e.g., `Week-03-Notes.qmd`) rendered with `format: gfm` (i.e., with GitHub-flavored markdown) to produce a Markdown file (e.g., `Week-03-Notes.md`).
